title: Cry Horror!
description: I WAS TRAPPED... in the suffocating depths of the earth.WHAT HORROR!Was that my voice screaming ... whimpering . . . imploring? I was sorry that I had not been taken by THEM before - because this was the worst way of all! ...AND THEN I SAW IT!Nothing in Heaven or Hell - and certainly nothing on earth - can equal the detailed spectres of horror and terror portrayed in these pages by H. P. Lovecraft.WARNING: Do not read too much at a single sitting - and never late at night!Original Title The Lurking Fear• Arthur Jermyn• Cool Air• Pickman's Model• The Call of Cthulhu • The Colour Out of Space • The Hound • The Lurking Fear • The Moon-Bog • The Nameless City • The Shunned House • The Unnamable Cover Illustration: Richard Powers
author: H.P. Lovecraft
